title: [Melgorehn's Valley, Grasslands]
description: A small patch of wildflowers decorates the area, breaking the monotony of the grasslands.  The shadow of Melgorehn's Reach blots out a wedge of the starry sky.  In the distance, you can hear the call of a mountain bird.

A small patch of wildflowers decorates the area, breaking the monotony of the grasslands.  The air is a bit cooler here as you begin to move into the shadow of Melgorehn's Reach.  In the distance, you can hear the call of a mountain bird.
